content: List 10 books that have won a Pulitzer Prize.

Certainly! Here are 10 books that have won the Pulitzer Prize for Fiction:

1. **"The Overstory"** by Richard Powers (2019)
2. **"Less"** by Andrew Sean Greer (2018)
3. **"The Underground Railroad"** by Colson Whitehead (2017)
4. **"The Sympathizer"** by Viet Thanh Nguyen (2016)
5. **"All the Light We Cannot See"** by Anthony Doerr (2015)
6. **"The Goldfinch"** by Donna Tartt (2014)
7. **"The Orphan Master's Son"** by Adam Johnson (2013)
8. **"A Visit from the Goon Squad"** by Jennifer Egan (2011)
9. **"Olive Kitteridge"** by Elizabeth Strout (2009)
10. **"The Road"** by Cormac McCarthy (2007)

These books are acclaimed works of fiction that have been recognized for their excellence in storytelling, character development, and thematic depth.
